control

Class GameCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • control.GameCreator

  • public class GameCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to create the game and all the controllers needed for the game to function. keeps references of the handlers for other classes to get.
    Author:
    Åke Ekmark, Andreas Wieselqvist och Simon Söderhäll.

      • endPlayerTurn

        public boolean endPlayerTurn(Player player)
        A method to try and end a players turn by making the move the player wants.
        Parameters:
        player - the one that wants to end its turn.
        Returns:
        true if the move was possible, false if it was not.

      • newHand

        public void newHand()
        a method to deal 4 new cards to all the players.

      • newDeck

        public void newDeck()
        a method to return all the cards from the players piles to the deck to start over again with a "new" deck. It's a good idea to shuffle the deck after this.
